actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the merit selection of United States attorneys and United States district court judges.

summary.text: Directs the President to promulgate and publish regulations and standards for merit selection of nominees for United States Attorney or United States district court judge. Stipulates that the President may waive such procedures and that no nomination may be invalidated for failure to comply with such procedures.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the merit selection of United States attorneys and United States district court judges.
